body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.14.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#397](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/397) UI: Add Response button (+) missing for OpenAPI 2.0 documents
* [#396](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/396) Provide a Way to Obtain Validation Issues While Editing an API
* [#393](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/393) issues with deployment of template in OpenShift 3.9.31
* [#392](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/392) Support a "UI only" mode for Apicurio
* [#390](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/390) Is there a way to add reusabel headers, responses, ... ?
* [#389](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/389) Web Site: The roadmap page formatting is broken
* [#388](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/388) Selection Service: Optimize so that multiple selection events for the same selection are squashed
* [#387](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/387) UX: Use flexbox in title-bar "edit" mode to layout input and buttons
* [#386](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/386) UX: Add Apply/Cancel buttons to Server entity editor
* [#385](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/385) UX: Update the Notification (bell) icon with new UX design
* [#383](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/383) UX: Remove all (optional) text from editor fields
* [#382](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/382) UX: Close button on entity editor should be black
* [#381](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/381) UX: Remove the close button from expanded entity rows
* [#380](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/380) Keycloak page not found error
* [#379](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/379) Support for assigning tags via GUI
* [#377](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/377) Facing issue while linking Github account
* [#376](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/376) UX: Update the L&F of the global Tag definitions
* [#375](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/375) UX: Update the L&F of the Contact Info (global)
* [#374](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/374) Facing issue with redirected uri
* [#372](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/372) Edit the whole OpenAPI doc
* [#371](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/371) Docker: Add variables for memory settings on startup
* [#370](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/370) UX: Undo/Redo support in the UI
* [#367](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/367) Restore the ability to quickly edit a 3.0 Response description
* [#363](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/363) UX: Update the L&F of Operation "Info" area (Summary, Description, Operation ID)
* [#362](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/362) UX: Update the L&F of the Server entity
* [#361](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/361) UX: Update the UX for the global Info section
* [#358](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/358) Issue with Account Linking.
* [#356](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/356) Issue - Forbidden
* [#355](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/355) Repo filtering and collaboration
* [#351](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/351) Improvement - Collaboration
* [#350](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/350) Bug: Only returning the first page when listing Bitbucket repositories
* [#347](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/347) Wrong API Version on Export
* [#328](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/328) Upgrade to the latest Keycloak version
* [#149](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/149) API Editor: Edit global consumes/produces


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.14
